7  API Reference

7.1 Core Classes

7.1.1 AINotebook

Main class for notebook processing.

class AINotebook:
    def __init__(self, api_keys=None, config_file=None):
        """Initialize AI Notebook.
        
        Args:
            api_keys (dict): API keys for providers
            config_file (str): Path to config file
        """
        
    def process_file(self, file_path, overwrite=False):
        """Process a notebook file.
        
        Args:
            file_path (str): Path to QMD file
            overwrite (bool): Force reprocessing
        """
        
    def process_audio(self, file_path, model="whisper"):
        """Process an audio file.
        
        Args:
            file_path (str): Path to audio file
            model (str): Model to use
        """

7.2 Configuration

7.2.1 settings.json

{
  "models": {
    "claude-haiku": {
      "provider": "anthropic",
      "model": "claude-3-haiku",
      "max_tokens": 4096
    },
    "gemini-pro": {
      "provider": "google",
      "model": "gemini-pro",
      "max_tokens": 8192
    }
  },
  "templates": {
    "path": "templates",
    "default_vars": {
      "STYLE": "academic",
      "LENGTH": "medium"
    }
  }
}

7.2.2 Template Format

name: template_name
description: Template description
variables:
  VAR1: string
  VAR2: string
prompt: |
  Your prompt here with
  {{VAR1}} and {{VAR2}}

7.3 Command Line Interface

7.3.1 Basic Commands

# Process a notebook
ainotebook process notebook.qmd

# Process audio
ainotebook audio recording.mp3 --model whisper

# Generate visualization
ainotebook visualize results.json

7.3.2 Options

# Force reprocessing
ainotebook process --overwrite

# Specify config
ainotebook process --config custom_config.json

# Set model
ainotebook process --model claude-haiku

7.4 Output Formats

7.4.1 JSON Response

{
  "metadata": {
    "file": "notebook.qmd",
    "model": "claude-haiku",
    "timestamp": "2024-03-15T10:30:00Z"
  },
  "blocks": [
    {
      "id": "block1",
      "label": "analysis",
      "model": "claude-haiku",
      "prompt": "...",
      "response": "...",
      "tokens": 1234
    }
  ]
}

7.4.2 Visualization Options

# Available metrics
metrics = [
    "response_time",
    "token_usage",
    "model_distribution",
    "cost_analysis",
    "template_usage"
]

# Chart types
chart_types = [
    "bar",
    "line",
    "scatter",
    "heatmap",
    "network"
]

# API Reference

## Core Classes

### AINotebook

Main class for notebook processing.

```python
class AINotebook:
    def __init__(self, api_keys=None, config_file=None):
        """Initialize AI Notebook.
        
        Args:
            api_keys (dict): API keys for providers
            config_file (str): Path to config file
        """
        
    def process_file(self, file_path, overwrite=False):
        """Process a notebook file.
        
        Args:
            file_path (str): Path to QMD file
            overwrite (bool): Force reprocessing
        """
        
    def process_audio(self, file_path, model="whisper"):
        """Process an audio file.
        
        Args:
            file_path (str): Path to audio file
            model (str): Model to use
        """

7.5 Configuration

7.5.1 settings.json

{
  "models": {
    "claude-haiku": {
      "provider": "anthropic",
      "model": "claude-3-haiku",
      "max_tokens": 4096
    },
    "gemini-pro": {
      "provider": "google",
      "model": "gemini-pro",
      "max_tokens": 8192
    }
  },
  "templates": {
    "path": "templates",
    "default_vars": {
      "STYLE": "academic",
      "LENGTH": "medium"
    }
  }
}

7.5.2 Template Format

name: template_name
description: Template description
variables:
  VAR1: string
  VAR2: string
prompt: |
  Your prompt here with
  {{VAR1}} and {{VAR2}}

7.6 Command Line Interface

7.6.1 Basic Commands

# Process a notebook
ainotebook process notebook.qmd

# Process audio
ainotebook audio recording.mp3 --model whisper

# Generate visualization
ainotebook visualize results.json

7.6.2 Options

# Force reprocessing
ainotebook process --overwrite

# Specify config
ainotebook process --config custom_config.json

# Set model
ainotebook process --model claude-haiku

7.7 Output Formats

7.7.1 JSON Response

{
  "metadata": {
    "file": "notebook.qmd",
    "model": "claude-haiku",
    "timestamp": "2024-03-15T10:30:00Z"
  },
  "blocks": [
    {
      "id": "block1",
      "label": "analysis",
      "model": "claude-haiku",
      "prompt": "...",
      "response": "...",
      "tokens": 1234
    }
  ]
}

7.7.2 Visualization Options

# Available metrics
metrics = [
    "response_time",
    "token_usage",
    "model_distribution",
    "cost_analysis",
    "template_usage"
]

# Chart types
chart_types = [
    "bar",
    "line",
    "scatter",
    "heatmap",
    "network"
]
